name: get_a_specific_movie_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool imdb_top_100_movies.
Tool description: This is a simple API for IMDb top 100 movies
API description: get top x movie by id 'top46' :
The Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Genre, Director, Writer and IMDb ID .

is_id.description: The IMDb ID of the specific movie to fetch.
